name: Anjuna
headline: Anjuna enabled organizations to trust any infrastructure
description: Anjuna makes hardware-grade application and data protection simple, fast and enterprise-ready. Anjuna software enables IT to “lift and shift” applications and data into the hardware-encrypted confines of a secure enclave, protecting them from malicious software, insiders, and bad actors. Available from every major chip, cloud, and system vendor, secure enclaves are the data security gold standard. Unlike point memory-only enclave solutions that require expensive and complicated software rewrites, Anjuna enables enterprises to achieve managed enterprise-class enclave protection that span memory, storage, networks, and clouds in minutes--without recoding. Anjuna is based in Palo Alto, California.

## Cornerstones of Confidential AI and Data Collaboration
ISOLATE
## Easily create a Trusted Execution Environment (TEE).
Abstract the instantiation of a TEE (secure enclave) to isolate data, code, and secrets. Anjuna Seaglass virtualizes modern CPUs and cloud infrastructure services to offer hardware-enforced isolation that protects from unauthorized access by users or software, regardless of privilege level.
Benefit from cloud economics for all your apps.
[Read the IDC report](https://www.anjuna.io/</resources/idc-secure-innovation-requires-confidential-computing>)
PROTECT
## **Encrypt data in all three states.**
Secure sensitive workloads by ensuring that data is always encrypted. Anjuna Seaglass implements a confidential runtime to enable data-in-use encryption inside the TEE, and control at-rest and in-transit encryption to prevent vulnerabilities as data leaves the confidential computing environment.
Make data privacy intrinsic to your public cloud environment.
[Read the white paper](https://www.anjuna.io/</resources/anjuna-delivers-a-77-1-advantage-against-the-mitre-att-ck-matrix>)
VERIFY
## **Authenticate the identity of your code.**
Create a high-trust environment by ensuring both your infrastructure and applications can be trusted before they are allowed to boot. Anjuna Seaglass uses a cryptographic attestation policy manager to orchestrate the secure distribution of secrets to applications inside the enclave.
Maintain control of the chain of trust of your code.
[Read our solution brief](https://www.anjuna.io/<https:/info.anjuna.io/rs/606-SWH-978/images/introduction-to-anjuna-confidential-computing-platform-solution-brief.pdf>)
FUTURE PROOF
## Secure apps across clouds without rework.
Run and manage all applications, traditional and cloud-native, on all the leading public clouds (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) without requiring code changes and using a consistent operational model. Learn more about Anjuna Seaglass.
Establish operational consistency without compromising security.
[Learn about our platform](https://www.anjuna.io/</product/seaglass>)

## Cornerstones of Confidential AI and Data Collaboration
ISOLATE
## Easily create a Trusted Execution Environment (TEE).
Abstract the instantiation of a TEE (secure enclave) to isolate data, code, and secrets. Anjuna Seaglass virtualizes modern CPUs and cloud infrastructure services to offer hardware-enforced isolation that protects from unauthorized access by users or software, regardless of privilege level.
Benefit from cloud economics for all your apps.
Read the IDC report⟨34⟩
PROTECT
## **Encrypt data in all three states.**
Secure sensitive workloads by ensuring that data is always encrypted. Anjuna Seaglass implements a confidential runtime to enable data-in-use encryption inside the TEE, and control at-rest and in-transit encryption to prevent vulnerabilities as data leaves the confidential computing environment.
Make data privacy intrinsic to your public cloud environment.
Read the white paper⟨35⟩
VERIFY
## **Authenticate the identity of your code.**
Create a high-trust environment by ensuring both your infrastructure and applications can be trusted before they are allowed to boot. Anjuna Seaglass uses a cryptographic attestation policy manager to orchestrate the secure distribution of secrets to applications inside the enclave.
Maintain control of the chain of trust of your code.
Read our solution brief⟨36⟩

**Company Overview: Anjuna**

Founded in 2018 and based in Palo Alto, California, Anjuna emerged as part of Y Combinator's Batch W18. The company focuses on simplifying hardware-grade application and data protection, enabling organizations to confidently trust any infrastructure. With a team of 55 employees, Anjuna is rapidly establishing itself as a leader in cloud workload security.

**Mission**

At its core, Anjuna's mission is to empower organizations to place their trust in any infrastructure by enabling powerful security measures that protect applications and data.

**Products and Solutions**

Anjuna's flagship product, **Anjuna Seaglass**, offers a universal confidential computing platform that allows applications to run securely across diverse cloud environments. It provides complete data security and privacy without necessitating complex code rewrites, making it a game-changer for organizations seeking ease of use alongside stringent security.

Another significant product, **Anjuna Northstar**, provides a private environment for businesses to extract value from AI-driven data, facilitating safe collaborations. This clean room solution enables multiple parties to analyze combined datasets while respecting individual privacy.

**Core Features:**

1. **Trusted Execution Environment (TEE)**: Anjuna simplifies the creation of secure enclaves — environments that isolate sensitive data, code, and secrets, reinforcing security against unauthorized access.
  
2. **End-to-End Data Encryption**: It ensures that data is encrypted at all times — in use, at rest, and in transit — reducing the risk of breaches.
  
3. **Policy-Based Control**: Anjuna incorporates cryptographic attestation, ensuring that only trusted infrastructure and applications can operate within the enclave.

4. **Seamless Integration**: Their solutions function across major clouds such as AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud, allowing enterprises to run all types of applications without needing extensive rework.

**Recognition and Partnerships**

Anjuna has garnered recognition as a Tech Innovator in Preemptive Cybersecurity by Gartner, underscoring its role at the forefront of the cybersecurity landscape. Its partnerships with industry giants like AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Intel further enhance its capabilities and reach.

**Target Industries**

Anjuna serves various sectors, including financial services, software providers, and even specialized markets like blockchain, allowing them to achieve high levels of security and compliance.

**Conclusion**

In a world where data security is paramount, Anjuna offers transformative solutions that blend simplicity with robust security mechanisms. Their approach makes protecting sensitive data across multiple platforms not only feasible but also efficient. For organizations eager to embrace the cloud without sacrificing security, Anjuna stands as a compelling choice.

For more information, visit their website: [Anjuna.io](https://www.anjuna.io).
